document_data.name: Corpsehaven
document_data.mainbody: '''Corpsehaven''' was a fortress in the [[Blood Rift]]. It was ruled over by the [[ultroloth]] [[Inthracis]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Geography: Corpsehaven was located on the steep side of [[Calaas]], the largest volcano in the Blood Rift.
document_data.Description: Corpsehaven was a three-story library-fortress. As the name implied, it was built out of many thousands of magically preserved bodies, decaying but kept at the point of death and semi-sentient so they could still feel their pain and suffering and emit moans. [[Demon]]s, [[devil]]s, [[yugoloth]]s, and mortals, all had been rivals and opponents of Inthracis.
document_data.Inhabitants: As well as being Inthracis's seat of power,
document_data.History: [[Vhaeraun]] met with Inthracis here in the {{YearlinkName|1373}}.
